summary: wifi: ath11k: fix failed to find the peer with peer_id 0 when disconnected
details:
wifi: ath11k: fix failed to find the peer with peer_id 0 when disconnected

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit a5b03df19041e5ce35c7f048fa84bf1b0ceb1311, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 01d2f285e3e5b629df9c61514e7ee07a54d0eed9. For more details please see the references link.
